Package index

Model specification

Functions for specifying and estimating FASSTER models

FASSTER()
Fast Additive Switching of Seasonality, Trend and Exogenous Regressors

Model extraction

Functions to extract information from fitted FASSTER models

tidy(<FASSTER>)
Extract coefficients from a FASSTER model
glance(<FASSTER>)
Glance at a FASSTER model
fitted(<FASSTER>)
Extract fitted values from a FASSTER model
residuals(<FASSTER>)
Extract residuals from a FASSTER model
components(<FASSTER>)
Extract Components from a FASSTER Model

Forecasting and prediction

Functions for generating forecasts and streaming new data

forecast(<FASSTER>)
Forecast a FASSTER model
interpolate(<FASSTER>)
Interpolate missing values in a FASSTER model

Model re-estimation

Functions for refitting and updating models with new data

refit(<FASSTER>)
Refit a FASSTER model
stream(<FASSTER>)
Stream new data through a FASSTER model

Reporting

Functions for displaying model information

report(<FASSTER>)
Report on a FASSTER model
